item.title: Bourbon | Starlight, VDN barrel finish, Maker13 selection

item.title: Bourbon | Wild Turkey Master's Keep One, toasted oak finish
item.description: Background # Wild Turkey is, well, Wild Turkey…any background I could provide would pale in comparison to the comprehensive body of work by David Jennings found over at rarebird101.
